page.title: 06A Day in my life
page.content:
At 8 am. I get up and brush my teeth afterwards I get dressed.I have my breakfast which is usually toast or a choice of cereals with a drink. I leave home about 8:45 am. When I reach school I play in the playground unless it is raining. At 9am. the bell rings and everyone hangs their coats up in the cloakroom and goes into class and gets their reading books out. After ten minutes reading we do some work. When Mrs. Loder tells us it is time for play we have our milk and we rush outside. We have half an hour play then we come in. We then work through to midday.
CONTINUED ON PAGE 7
